pr_title: SAK-43583 - Samigo > Retracted Warning Message Out of Date

timeline.message: SAK-43583 - Samigo > Retracted Warning Message Out of Date

timeline.author: ottenhoff
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -73,7 +73,7 @@ alt_sortLastModifiedAscending=Sort by Last Modified in Ascending
 alt_sortLastModifiedDescending=Sort by LastModified in Descending
 
 asterisk_2=**
-retracted_for_edit=To make a retracted assessment available to students, click "Edit" under Select Action, click "Edit" again, then select the appropriate republish option.
+retracted_for_edit=This assessment has been retracted. To make a retracted assessment available to students, click the "Actions" button and select "Edit", click "Edit" again, then select the appropriate republish option.

replies.bodyText: Makes sense to me, there are two edit buttons:
replies.author: mpellicer

replies.bodyText: how about click the "Edit" button  instead of click "Edit" again
replies.author: ottenhoff

replies.bodyText:
Sure, makes more sense, I just implemented the proposed text in the Jira.
Thanks Sam!
replies.author: mpellicer
